title: Curry torches Spurs again, ties MJ with latest 40
content: Two days after he lit up the Spurs for 46 points, Warriors star Stephen Curry scored 49 to beat them Friday night, tying Michael Jordan's record for most 40-point games after turning 30 in the process.

title: After 6 ejected, WVU women upset No. 15 Duke
content: Down to just five players after six Mountaineers were ejected before the half, West Virginia managed to grind out a 57-49 upset of No. 15 Duke on Friday night.

title: Pistons top 76ers without stars for 9th straight win
content: The East-leading Detroit Pistons extended their win streak to nine games, their longest since 2007-08, with a 114-105 win over the Philadelphia 76ers Friday night.

title: Boozer's 35 points tie 2nd most by Duke freshman
content: Cameron Boozer scored 35 points in Friday's 100-62 victory over Indiana State, tying the second-most points in a game for a Duke freshman behind only Cooper Flagg's 42 last season.

title: Belichick dispels Giants talk, reaffirms UNC focus
content: North Carolina coach Bill Belichick said Friday he will not pursue any NFL head coaching vacancies after his name surfaced in connection with the vacant New York Giants job.

title: Thomas has back surgery, to miss PGA Tour start
content: Two-time major winner Justin Thomas announced Friday that he will miss the beginning of the 2026 PGA Tour season after undergoing back surgery.

title: Disney, YouTube TV reach deal, ending blackout
content: Disney and YouTube TV reached a new deal to bring channels such as ABC and ESPN back to the Google-owned live-streaming platform Friday, ending a blackout for customers that lasted over two weeks.

title: 'Last Chance U' coach Beam dies after being shot
content: College football coach John Beam, who was featured in the Netflix series "Last Chance U," has died after being shot, the Oakland Police Department said Friday.

title: üçå Bradley Jr. No. 1 pick in Banana Ball draft
content: The Indianapolis Clowns selected Bradley at No. 1 as part of the inaugural Banana Ball draft Thursday night.

title: Ready for NFL Week 11? We have sleepers, QB questions, trends to watch and more
content: Big game coming for Aaron Rodgers? Matchup questions for the Seahawks and Rams? An edge for Jared Goff against the Eagles? Catch up on Week 11.

title: 14 more Week 11 games, 14 matchup previews: Predictions and picks
content: Football in Spain? Baker Mayfield vs. Josh Allen? Picks, predictions and stats for every Week 11 game.

title: 'We want AJ!': What sold Dybantsa on BYU over basketball's blue bloods
content: Advice from Kevin Durant. A program modeled after an NBA team. Here's how the No. 1 recruit landed in Provo.

title: Looking for the next Cignetti? Start with these traits and coaches
content: If any of the nine open Power 4 jobs want to replicate Indiana's success, here are the steps they could take.

title: Real or not real: Another perfect UConn season? UCLA's best team ever?
content: Can Azzi Fudd & Co. run the table? Is this Dawn Staley's best South Carolina backcourt? Let's debate.

title: Will Tigers trade Skubal? What we learned about all 30 teams at the MLB GM meetings
content: From Tarik Skubal's status to the future of the Phillies' core, here are the top offseason priorities straight from every front office.

title: Lucky or unlucky: How have Premier League teams fared this season?
content: Which Premier League teams have ridden their luck, and which have been unlucky over injuries, VAR and managerial changes this season?

title: Who would win the 2026 World Cup if it kicked off today?
content: We're seven months from the start of the 2026 World Cup. While qualification wraps up, our writers answer a simple question: Who's winning it right now?

title: VAR Review: Why was Ronaldo sent off for Portugal?
content: Cristiano Ronaldo was shown a red card against the Republic of Ireland after appearing to elbow Dara O'Shea.

title: The key to Zilisch becoming NASCAR's next big star
content: The NASCAR Cup Series isn't kind to rookies, no matter how highly touted, but that may not apply to Connor Zilisch when he steps up in 2026.

title: How Roldan went from USMNT afterthought to Pochettino favorite
content: A few months ago, Cristian Roldan believed his USMNT career was drifting away. Now he could be in line for a key role under Mauricio Pochettino.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Man United want to sign Wolves' Jo√£o Gomes
content: Wolverhampton Wanderers midfielder Jo√£o Gomes is a target for Manchester United. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: New Photograph Shows Delhi Suicide Bomber Umar Mohammad In Doctor's Attire
content: Umar Mohammad, the terrorist who carried out a suicide car bomb attack near Delhi's Red Fort, was seen on CCTV in a doctor's attire.

title: Delhi Blast Suspects Used 'Dead Drop' Emails To Communicate: Sources
content: The terror suspects being probed in connection with the 10/11 Delhi blast used a special method called 'dead drop' emails to communicate, sources said. This is how the arrested doctors, the investigators believe, planned their terror activities.

title: "Disowning Family, Quitting Politics": Tejashwi Yadav's Sister After RJD Rout
content: Dropping a bombshell a day after the RJD suffered a devastating loss in the Bihar Assembly elections, party chief Lalu Yadav's daughter Rohini Acharya has said she is disowning her family and quitting politics.

title: Adani Ahmedabad Marathon Unveils Official Jersey At Palladium Mall Ahead Of 9th Edition
content: The official jersey for the 9th Adani Ahmedabad Marathon was revealed at Palladium Mall on Saturday, in front of fitness enthusiasts and local runners.

title: Union Health Minister JP Nadda Launches 10 New AMRIT pharmacies
content: The Union government on Saturday launched 10 new AMRIT (Affordable Medicines and Reliable Implants for Treatment) pharmacies to increase access to affordable medicines and strengthen healthcare in the country.

title: Karnataka Man Mixes Poisonous Plant In Neighbour's Food To Avenge Old Feud
content: Investigators initially found a bottle of pesticide at the home, but during further questioning, the accused revealed that they had used the toxic Datura plant to contaminate the 'sambar' served at lunch.

title: Microsoft, Facing Conservative Pressure, Disavows Religion Bias
content: Microsoft Corp. signed an agreement to put to rest accusations that it used a litmus test to deny software discounts to conservative faith-based groups.

title: Who Is Lina Khan, Named By Zohran Mamdani As Co-Chair Of His Transition Team
content: Lina Khan, known for her tough antitrust stance and clashes with Big Tech, has been appointed co-chair of Zohran Mamdanis transition team.

title: JD(U) MP Sanjay Jha Meets Nitish Kumar, Says Mandate Accepted With Humility
content: Following his meeting with Bihar Chief Minister Nitish Kumar after the NDA's resounding victory in the state elections, JD(U) MP Sanjay Jha on Saturday said that the entire alliance has accepted the mandate with "great humility."

title: Zohran Mamdani Calls For Starbucks Boycott Amid Nationwide Strike
content: New York City-elect mayor Zohran Mamdani has called for a boycott of Starbucks after more than a thousand labourers went on strike across the country.

title: Belagavi Call Centre That Targeted US Citizens Raided, 33 Arrested
content: The police in Karnataka's Belagavi raided and shut down an illegally operated international fraud call centre that had been targeting US citizens and siphoning off large sums of money through sophisticated cyber scams.

title: Bihar Election Results 2025 LIVE: "Achieved Position My Father Envisioned," Says Chirag Paswan After NDA Win
content: The National Democratic Alliance (NDA) in Bihar has registered¬†a thumping victory and Chief Minister Nitish Kumar is set for a fifth consecutive term, as the coalition won 202 of the 243 seats in the state.¬†

title: Suspended Ex-Minister RK Singh Quits BJP After Crackdown On Bihar Rebels
content: Former Union Minister RK Singh has been suspended by the BJP over anti-party activities, days after the senior leader questioned the NDA leadership and raised serious allegations against the Bihar government.

title: Kannada Film Actor Alleges Stalking, Harassment By Businessman She Met In 2022
content: According to the complaint submitted to the police on October 17, the actress had met the businessman, identified as Aravind Venkatesh Reddy, during an event in Sri Lanka.

title: 'No Sorrow In Defeat, No Arrogance In Victory': RJD After Bihar Poll Defeat
content: The Rashtriya Janata Dal (RJD) on Saturday said that the ups and downs are "inevitable" in the "endless journey of public service", a day after it faced one of its worst setbacks in the Bihar assembly elections.

title: Delhi Blast Woman Suspect Wanted To Flee, Had Applied For Passport: Sources
content: One of the terror suspects arrested in connection with the 10/11 Delhi blast was likely preparing to flee the country, with sources pointing out that she had recently applied for a passport.

title: "Speculation Unnecessary": J&K Top Cop Says Blast In Nowgam "Accidental"
content: The Jammu and Kashmir Director General of Police (DGP), Nalin Prabhat, stressed on Saturday that any speculation about the incident was unnecessary, as preliminary findings pointed to an inadvertent blast during a mandated forensic procedure.

title: Cops Detain 2 More Doctors from Al Falah University Known To Umar Nabi
content: Delhi Police have detained three persons, including two doctors from Haryana's Al Falah University who were known to Dr Umar Nabi, the driver of the car that exploded near the Red Fort, officials said on Saturday.

title: Surgeon With Previous Link To Al Falah University Detained In Punjab
content: Investigating agencies have detained a doctor from Punjab's Pathankot for questioning in connection with the Delhi blast earlier this week, police sources said on Saturday.

title: Delhi Blast Updates: Two Gates Of Red Fort Metro Station Reopen Days After Explosion
content: Thirteen people were killed and many others injured after a car driven by a doctor at Al-Falah University exploded near the Red Fort Metro Station on Monday.

title: Crisis brewing? How Pak is dismantaling its judiciary - and giving more power to Munir
content: Pakistan's judiciary faces a crisis as senior judges resign following a controversial constitutional amendment. This change centralizes power, creating a new Federal Constitutional Court and elevating the army chief to Chief of Defence Forces with extended tenure. Critics decry the move as an attack on judicial independence and civilian oversight, potentially impacting ongoing legal cases.

title: 'Quitting politics': Rohini Acharya 'disowns' Lalu family day after RJD's Bihar poll debacle
content: Following a significant electoral setback for the Mahagathbandhan, Lalu Prasad's daughter, Rohini Acharya, announced her departure from politics and disowned her family. She claimed this decision was prompted by Sanjay Yadav and Rameez, taking full responsibility for the outcome. Acharya's statement on X has sparked considerable discussion regarding the party's future direction.

title: Zuckerberg's charity insight: Researchers demanding GPUs; reject space and staff
content: Mark Zuckerberg and Priscilla Chan's philanthropic organisation, CZI, is now prioritising computing power, specifically GPUs, over physical expansion for its science and AI mission.  Researchers at Biohub are demanding more GPUs, which Chan describes as 'new lab space' that is more expensive than traditional facilities. This strategic shift aims to accelerate breakthroughs in AI-powered biology.

title: 'Exit polls undermined LJP(RV)': Chirag dismisses rift rumours with JD(U); flays surveys
content: Chirag Paswan, LJP(RV) chief, refuted claims of discord between his party and Nitish Kumar's JD(U) during the Bihar elections, calling it a 'false narrative'. He highlighted his party's strong performance, exceeding exit poll predictions, and praised Nitish Kumar's determined campaigning. Paswan also criticized the opposition's language and their post-result blame game, emphasizing NDA's unity and commitment to Bihar's aspirations.

title: 'Part of India‚Äôs consciousness': PM Modi assures welfare of tribal community
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi highlighted the significant contributions of tribal communities to India's independence movement, criticizing past Congress governments for neglecting their welfare and contributions. He emphasized his administration's commitment to tribal development, including healthcare, education, and sports, and the recognition of tribal heroes like Bhagwan Birsa Munda.

title: IND vs SA | Jadeja dismantles visitors with four-for; Proteas reduced to 93/7 at stumps
content: Ravindra Jadeja's exceptional spell has put South Africa in a precarious position, ending Day 2 at 93/7 and leading by just 63 runs. India had earlier been bowled out for 189, with Marco Jansen and Simon Harmer taking seven wickets between them. Jadeja's 4/29, supported by Kuldeep Yadav's 2/12, has India firmly in control.

title: 'America is going the way of Europe': Why JPMorgan CEO Dimon issued a warning
content: JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon issued a dire warning, stating the US faces European-style economic decline if anti-business policies persist. He urged immediate action to reverse excessive regulation and taxation, which he believes drive companies away and ultimately harm lower-paid citizens. Dimon highlighted states like Florida and Texas as successful models for growth-friendly policies.

title: Delhi car blast probe: New CCTV footage shows 'bomber' Umar at Faridabad shop; had 2 phones
content: New CCTV footage from Faridabad shows Jaish-e-Mohammed terrorist Umar Mohammed using multiple phones before the Red Fort blast. Security forces demolished his family home in Pulwama as part of a crackdown on terror modules procuring vehicles and chemicals. Authorities also attached the home of a separatist leader suspected to be in Pakistan-occupied Kashmir.

title: Camille Kostek supports Rob Gronkowski as he reflects on following Tom Brady
content: Rob Gronkowski officially retired as a Patriot, signing a one-day contract to conclude his illustrious career. His partner, Camille Kostek, celebrated the emotional homecoming on Instagram with a heartfelt tribute. The post featured cherished moments, including a photo with owner Robert Kraft and a special appearance by their French bulldog, Ralphie, sporting a Patriots jersey.

title: India second largest importer of Russian crude oil in October
content: Despite US objections, India continues to be a major buyer of Russian crude oil, ranking second globally in October with $2.5 billion in purchases. This trend persists as Western nations urge limitations on imports financing Russia's war in Ukraine. China remains the top buyer of Russian fossil fuels overall.

title: GM to suppliers: Find alternatives to China; America‚Äôs largest carmaker sets deadline
content: General Motors is directing thousands of suppliers to remove China-sourced parts and raw materials from their supply chains, aiming for complete divestment by 2027. This move, intensified by deepening U.S.-China trade hostilities and President Trump's policies, seeks to enhance supply chain resiliency. Carmakers are accelerating efforts to unwind decades-old sourcing ties due to ongoing geopolitical and economic wrangling.

title: MI to LSG! Arjun Tendulkar bids farewell to Mumbai Indians; Sara Tendulkar's emotional message grabs attention
content: Arjun Tendulkar has been traded from Mumbai Indians to Lucknow Super Giants for IPL 2026 at his existing price of Rs 30 lakh.  He expressed his excitement to join LSG.  Meanwhile, Mumbai Indians have reacquired leg-spinner Mayank Markande from Kolkata Knight Riders, marking his return to his former franchise.

title: Chinese SUV tries Range Rover‚Äôs viral stunt: Watch Epic fail!
content: It offers 225 mm of ground clearance, approach and departure angles of 22¬∞ and 30¬∞, a suite of terrain programs, 21-inch wheels, and even a tank-turn feature, equipment clearly intended to position it alongside established off-road nameplates.

title: Youngest NHL overtime hero ever: Matthew Schaefer breaks records with OT goal for Islanders
content: Eighteen-year-old Matthew Schaefer, the 2025 No. 1 overall pick, is making a historic impact for the New York Islanders. He recently became the youngest player to score an overtime goal, contributing to a 3-2 win. Schaefer's impressive rookie season includes 15 points in 18 games, establishing him as a cornerstone defenseman.

title: Track Queen Anna Hall stuns fans with surprise engagement to NFL star Darius Slayton
content: World champion heptathlete Anna Hall announced her engagement to NFL wide receiver Darius Slayton on Instagram. The proposal took place on the track where they first met, with fellow athletes and fans sending warm congratulations. Hall is currently enjoying a successful season, having recently won gold at the Tokyo World Championships.

title: Who is Cedric Irving Jr? Oakland police name suspect as Laney College mourns John Beam
content: Oakland police identified Cedric Irving Jr. as the suspect in the fatal shooting of Laney College football coach John Beam. The incident occurred Thursday at the campus fieldhouse, leading to a lockdown. Irving Jr. was arrested Friday morning while armed, following an overnight search. The motive for the shooting remains under investigation.

title: 'Ups and downs inevitable': RJD's first reaction after Bihar defeat; calls itself 'party of poor'
content: The Rashtriya Janata Dal (RJD) has reacted to its significant defeat in the Bihar assembly elections, stating it is not despondent despite a crushing loss to the ruling NDA. The party emphasized that public service is an ongoing journey with inevitable ups and downs, vowing to continue raising the voice of the poor.

title: 'I commend Mohsin Naqvi': Shehbaz Sharif congratulates Pakistan team; gets trolled
content: Babar Azam's unbeaten 102 guided Pakistan to an eight-wicket victory over Sri Lanka, securing the ODI series 2-0. The win drew praise from Pakistan's Prime Minister, but drew a critical response from former Indian cricketer Aakash Chopra regarding the significance of the bilateral series win.

title: Trump‚Äôs tariffs cut US toy orders by 50%; how are Indian exporters fighting back
content: Indian toy exporters face a significant slowdown as US buyers divert orders to other nations following a 50% tariff imposition. Despite a strong start to the financial year, new orders for the upcoming festive season have plummeted by half.

title: 'Explosive samples were being forwarded‚Ä¶': Govt calls Nowgam blast accidental ‚Äî what MHA said
content: An accidental explosion at Nowgam Police Station in Srinagar killed nine people and injured 27 others. The blast occurred while processing a large cache of explosive substances and chemicals recovered during a terror module investigation. The ministry of home affairs has ruled out any terror angle, attributing the incident to the unstable nature of the seized materials.

title: Infosys hands out Sept quarter bonus: Employees to get 75% average bonus; check details
content: Infosys has announced performance-linked payouts for the September quarter, with employees receiving an average bonus of 75% of their eligible amount. This figure is slightly lower than the previous quarter's average of 80%. Payouts varied by job level and performance rating, with bonuses ranging from 70.5% to 83% and will be added to November salaries.

title: Maithili Thakur becomes youngest Bihar MLA after Sa Re Ga Ma Pa & Indian Idol rejections
content: Maithili Thakur, a 25-year-old BJP candidate, made a historic win in Bihar's Alinagar constituency. Despite early rejections in singing reality shows, her breakthrough on 'Rising Star' propelled her career. She is now celebrated for her political debut and dedication to Mithila culture.

title: Bihar: 5 dead as fire breaks out in Muzaffarpur; short circuit suspected as cause
content: A devastating fire in Muzaffarpur's Motipur Nagar Parishad area on Friday night claimed the lives of five individuals from the same family. Five others sustained serious injuries and are currently undergoing treatment. Firefighting operations are ongoing, with preliminary reports indicating a short circuit as the probable cause of the blaze.

title: ‚ÄòEkdum dhaga khol diya‚Äô: Vaibhav hits 144 runs in 42 balls
content: As Bihar celebrated Nitish Kumar‚Äôs landslide win, thousands of kilometres away, Vaibhav Sooryavanshi delivered his own fireworks, smashing 15 sixes and registering the joint second-fastest T20 hundred by an Indian. Already an IPL record-breaker, the Samastipur sensation is drawing praise from coaches who see him as Bihar‚Äôs MS Dhoni-like beacon.

title: What does the colour of your urine say about your health
content: Your urine's colour offers vital health clues, from pale yellow indicating good hydration to darker shades suggesting dehydration. Unusual hues like red, brown, or even blue-green can signal infections, liver issues, or rare conditions. Even foamy or cloudy urine warrants attention. Observing these changes can prompt timely medical checks and aid personal wellness.

title: Putting 2020 behind? Chirag Paswan meets Nitish Kumar after NDA‚Äôs big Bihar win
content: Chirag Paswan met Bihar CM Nitish Kumar, congratulating him on NDA's sweeping victory in the assembly elections and refuting speculation of a rift between their parties. Paswan highlighted the CM's appreciation for all alliance partners, emphasising their collaborative success in the polls.

title: Delhi car blast: CCTV footage captures impact of explosion inside Lal Quila metro station ‚Äî watch
content: CCTV footage from Lal Quila Metro Station shows commuters panicking during the car blast near the Red Fort. Delhi Police are intensifying digital surveillance and have filed a fresh FIR to investigate a "deeper conspiracy" behind the attack, with initial reports suggesting military-grade explosives may have been used.

title: When four wheels become weapons: Delhi‚Äôs 1st suicide car bombing exposes new threat ‚Äî why cops should worry
content: Delhi faces its first Suicide Vehicle-Borne Improvised Explosive Device (SVBIED) attack, a deadly tactic where vehicle parts become lethal projectiles.  These blasts are hard to prevent due to civilian vehicle camouflage and bomber commitment.  Intelligence, public vigilance, and physical barriers are crucial for future prevention.

title: Was WhistlinDiesel arrested? Reported tax-evasion leak sparks online buzz
content: Popular YouTuber Cody Shane Detwiler, also known as WhistlinDiesel, faced arrest on November 13, 2025. Reports indicate tax evasion charges in Williamson County, Tennessee. A substantial bond was set. Detwiler himself confirmed the arrest via social media. This news has sparked widespread online discussion among his followers and the wider internet community.

title: Is Giannis Antetokounmpo playing tonight vs Hornets? Latest Bucks injury update
content: Giannis Antetokounmpo is probable to play tonight against the Charlotte Hornets after resting the previous game due to left knee patellar tendinopathy. The persistent condition requires careful load management, but his recent dominant performance highlights his continued impact. His return is crucial for the Bucks, who are also dealing with other roster injuries.

title: Gabrielle Union shares emotional birthday tribute for sister Tracy
content: Gabrielle Union recently celebrated her sister Tracy's birthday with a touching Instagram post featuring cherished childhood photos. The heartwarming tribute, which also saw tributes from Dwyane Wade and daughter Kaavia James, has captivated fans. This follows Union's equally emotional birthday message for Kaavia, highlighting the actress's deep family connections.

title: Dharmendra to celebrate his 90th birthday next month as family plans double celebration
content: Iconic star Dharmendra is on the mend after his recent hospital stay and is gearing up for a milestone 90th birthday bash this December. His beloved wife, Hema Malini, reassures fans that he‚Äôs in good spirits. Close friend Salman Khan has been a constant source of support, visiting him in the hospital and expressing heartfelt wishes for his speedy recovery.

title: Punjab woman who visited Pakistan as part of Sikh pilgrimage group goes missing
content: A woman pilgrim from Punjab, Sarbjit Kaur, has not returned to India after participating in Guru Nanak Dev's birth anniversary celebrations in Pakistan. She was part of a large Sikh group that visited various shrines. Pakistani immigration authorities have informed their Indian counterparts about the incident.

title: ‚Äò10Dulkar‚Äô of Bihar: Nitish set for 10th oath as CM; how he rode on a wave of pro-incumbency
content: Nitish Kumar has secured a decisive victory in the Bihar assembly polls, defying expectations and demonstrating his enduring appeal. His ability to consolidate support across diverse caste groups, coupled with a focus on governance and development, propelled the JDU-led NDA to a landslide win, marking his tenth term as Chief Minister.

title: IPL: From RR to CSK! How big a pay cut did Jadeja take to join?
content: Ravindra Jadeja has officially moved to Rajasthan Royals from Chennai Super Kings in a major IPL trade. After 12 seasons with CSK, the all-rounder accepts a reduced salary at RR, marking a homecoming to the team where he began his IPL career. This significant deal also sees Sanju Samson move to CSK and Sam Curran join the Royals.

title: Delhi car blast case: Terror accused Dr Shaheen applied for passport; planned to flee Dubai
content: A doctor from Al-Falah University, Dr. Shaheen Shahid, was arrested for her alleged role in a terror plot, attempting to flee to Dubai. Her involvement surfaced after a colleague's arrest and the recovery of an assault rifle from her car. The module, targeting students and doctors, was dismantled through arrests across multiple locations.

title: India-Canada trade: Goyal says 'all possibilities are on the table' ‚Äî FTA talks to resume?
content: India is exploring all options to resume free trade agreement negotiations with Canada. Commerce Minister Piyush Goyal held recent discussions with his Canadian counterpart, Maninder Sidhu. These engagements aim to boost bilateral cooperation and strategic partnership. Trade figures show a rise in Indian exports to Canada. The diplomatic relationship is gaining momentum after recent high-level meetings.

title: Historic! Pant surpasses legendary Sehwag; sets new record for India
content: Rishabh Pant has etched his name in Test cricket history, surpassing Virender Sehwag to become India's leading six-hitter. His aggressive batting propelled India to a strong position after Jasprit Bumrah's exceptional bowling performance saw South Africa dismissed for a low score.  Pant's record-breaking six underscored his fearless approach, vital for India's chase.

title: Parth Pawar land row: Congress leader seeks HC-monitored probe
content: The Congress Legislature Party leader has written a letter to Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis seeking a "neutral, independent and detailed" investigation

title: Institute of Advanced Virology named regional coordinator of national One Health initiative
content: Institute will receive Central funding of ‚Çπ5 crore in the first phase for fulfilling its tasks under the new role

title: Researchers to study rare dolphin-fisher kinship in Ashtamudi Lake
content: Study aims to unravel mechanisms driving unique cooperation between wild dolphins and traditional fishers in Ashtamudi Lake. No animals will be captured, handled, or disturbed as part of the research

title: Bengal Congress leader Cwrites to Amit Shah to ease SIR norms for Matuas
content: The HinduThe Hindu stated that many Matua names were missing from the 2002 voters' list, the SIR base year

title: The ‚Äòunseen‚Äô wonderlands of Andhra Pradesh‚Äôs heartland
content: Despite having magnificent tourist attractions in erstwhile Nellore and Prakasam districts, their tourism value remains untapped. Trash, absence of  relevant information boards, unregulated fares, tortuous procedures and a dearth of basic amenities force residents as well as outside tourists turn their backs on these natural and historical wonderlands

title: Railways conduct full-scale safety mock drill at Kollam Junction railway station
content: The mock drill was designed to strengthen disaster response capabilities and provide hands-on training for managing train accidents through a realistic scenario

title: Quitting politics and disowning my family: Lalu's daughter Rohini after RJD faces defeat in Bihar
content: ‚ÄúI am quitting politics and I am disowning my family‚Ä¶This is what Sanjay Yadav and Rameez had asked me to do‚Ä¶and I am taking all the blame," Rohini Acharya wrote in her post.

title: CII Summit| A.P. government and WEF sign MoU for the establishment of a Centre for Energy & Cyber Resilience
content: It is a first-of-its-kind of initiative in India that integrates clean energy innovation, AI-led digital transformation, and cyber resilience under a unified platform

title: LDF government, CPI(M), and Congress to separately move SC to defer SIR till after local body polls in Kerala
content: Govindan claims that BJP had found the SIR unfeasible during the local body elections. Still, the party underscored that it would not take part in the litigation against EC‚Äôs decision in Supreme Court

title: NIA arrests MBBS student from Bengal's Uttar Dinajpur for alleged links with terror outfits
content: The accused, identified as Janisur Alam alias Nisar Alam, an MBBS student of Al-Falah University, Haryana, says senior police officer

title: V.K. Damodaran, Kerala Sasthra Sahithya Parishad founder and environmentalist, passes away at 85
content: A science writer and communicator with more than 20 books to his credit, he had a long academic career behind him and led several research projects and programmes

title: Rahul Gandhi meets Kharge to discuss Congress Bihar poll drubbing, party asserts ‚Äòvote chori‚Äô charge
content: The leaders met to discuss the Congress' poor performance in Bihar, where the party won only six of the 61 seats it contested, its second-worst show in the State after 2010, when it won only four seats

title: Uttar Pradesh Government moves to withdraw charges against Dadri lynching accused
content: The Assistant District Government Counsel, Gautam Buddha Nagar, Bhag Singh Bhati acted on the directions of the State Government through a letter dated August 26, 2025

title: 31 girl students injured as school bus overturns in Jharkhand's Koderma
content: The accident took place on the Ranchi-Patna main road in Koderma Valley under Koderma police station limits when the school bus carrying them from Jawahar Navodaya Vidyalaya in Puto, Chandwara, overturned

title: Bihar Assembly elections: CPI(M) in Kerala blames Congress for ‚Äòfailing to unite‚Äô anti-BJP forces
content: CPI(M) State secretary M.V. Govindan  accuses AICC general secretary K.C. Venugopal of ‚Äòforsaking‚Äô the latter‚Äôs Bihar responsibilities to carve a niche for himself in Kerala politics ahead of 2026 Assembly polls

title: Two Al-Falah University doctors among three detained by Delhi Police in terror module case
content: ‚ÄúThe two were allegedly in touch with Dr. Muzammil Ganaie, who has been arrested in connection with the wider probe into a 'white collar' terror module. They were also close friends of Dr. Umar Nabi,‚Äù says officials

title: Congress signals solo fight for Mumbai civic polls
content: ‚ÄúWe must ensure the election of Congress corporators. Prepare for all 227 seats," says Mumbai Congress president Varsha Gaikwad

title: Madras High Court permits indefinite fast against GCC‚Äôs outsourcing of conservancy work
content: Justice A.D. Jagadish Chandira orders that the fast could be observed at the Uzhaippor Urimai Iyakkam office in Ambattur

title: Ramayana retold | Review of Telugu writer Volga‚Äôs novel, On the Banks of the Pampa
content: Sabari isn‚Äôt merely a symbol of devotion but of resistance against caste, cultural appropriation, and the tussle between ecology and empire building

title: Bihar Assembly polls: I fought to resurrect LJP (RV) after poll debacle in 2020, says Chirag Paswan
content: Chirag Paswan said he congratulated Nitish Kumar for resounding victory of the NDA and discussed next government formation

title: Kerala local body polls: Outgoing Mayor Arya Rajendran‚Äôs absence from the fray, governance record dominate Thiruvananthapuram Corporation campaign
content: CPI(M)‚Äôs surprise decision to upend ageing and established political power structures in Thiruvananthapuram Corporation in 2021 by nominating Arya Rajendran as Mayor arguably appears to have prompted Congress and BJP as well to experiment with comparable dramatic turns in candidate announcement in 2025

title: What are the Digital Personal Data Protection Rules and when do they apply?
content: The Digital Personal Data Protection Rules, 2025 were notified on Friday (November 14, 2025). Here is what they mean for privacy and the right to information

title: Manipur Police asks people not to circulate content on social media that can generate 'fear'
content: Police said, "Security forces across the State, including those stationed in border areas, remain highly alert and are taking all required measures to uphold peace and ensure public safety"

title: Rusted mortar shell found in Jammu & Kashmir‚Äôs Samba; efforts on to neutralise it
content: ‚ÄúThe shell was noticed by some labourers near an educational institute in the town at 10 a.m.,‚Äù they said

title: Dharwad ZP CEO directs officials to expedite work on multi-village drinking water supply project
content: The project to supply drinking water to 388 villages in Dharwad district is being implemented in DBOT mode

title: IndiGo, Akasa Air to commence flight operations from Navi Mumbai airport on December 25
content: IndiGo said it will connect the future-ready airport to ten cities across India including Delhi, Bengaluru, Hyderabad, Ahmedabad, Lucknow, North Goa (Mopa), Jaipur, Nagpur, Cochin, and Mangalore, starting December 25

title: Indian Army‚Äôs Gajraj Corps develops high-altitude monorail in Arunachal Pradesh
content: The in-house High Altitude Monorail System will support operations at 16,000 feet in the Kameng Himalayas of Arunachal Pradesh

title: Punjab government suspends SSP for 'failing' to act against gangsters
content: No laxity of any kind will be tolerated in action against gangsters, says Punjab Chief Minister Bhagwant Mann

title: PM Modi reviews under-construction bullet train station in Surat

title: First albino Asian water snake recorded in Assam
content: Albinism is an extremely rare genetic trait in wild snakes, characterised by the absence of melanin pigment

title: Madras HC directs authorities to issue passport to man born in T.N. to Sri Lankan Tamil parents
content: His parents, along with other refugees, had arrived from Sri Lanka and were accommodated at the Sri Lankan Tamils Rehabilitation Camp in Kottapattu, Tiruchi, in 1983

title: NIA arrests youth from West Bengal‚Äôs Uttar Dinajpur for alleged links with terror outfits

title: ‚ÄòAnti-conversion‚Äô law: Arunachal Pradesh appoints head of panel to examine draft rules
content: The Gauhati High Court had in September 2024 ordered the State Government to finalise the rules for implementing the Arunachal Pradesh Freedom of Religion Act of 1978

title: Explosives recovered from Faridabad transported to Nowgam police station in air-tight containers over past two days, says official
content: The explosives were being packed in small bags and were to be transported to Forensic Sciences Laboratory (FSL) in Jammu when the ‚Äúaccidental explosion‚Äù occurred on November 14 at 11.22 pm, the official said

title: Police book 12 for illegally selling government land earmarked for cemetery in Bhiwandi
content: The police on November 14, 2025, registered a case under Section 318 of the Bharatiya Nyaya Sanhita (BNS) based on a complaint lodged by a revenue official following an investigation into the fraud that took place in April 1976,‚Äù an official said

title: As school-college tour season begins, Kerala MVD launches crackdown on tourist buses using illegal lights and sound systems
content: MVD has instructed school and college authorities to share details of tourist buses they charter for field trips so that inspectors can examine the vehicles before the journey

title: India calls for greater transparency in functioning of UNSC subsidiary organs
content: Ambassador Parvathaneni Harish underscored the need for greater transparency in the functioning of the subsidiary organs

content: A huge quantity of explosive substances recovered from Faridabad were kept securely in an open area and were to be forwarded to the forensic lab, the J&K DGP said

title: ‚ÄòNo faith in Crime Branch,‚Äô says Goa AAP, demands judicial inquiry into cash-for-jobs scam
content: ‚ÄúThe Minister should immediately step down for an impartial investigation into the case. We have no faith in the Crime Branch. There should be a judicial inquiry into the case,‚Äù says Goa AAP president Amit Palekar

title: Kerala man removes fuses of transformers after power to his house cut
content: Allegedly angered by disconnection of electricity to his house for non-payment of bills, he removed the fuses of seven transformers, causing a power outage in parts of Kasaragod town, say Kerala State Electricity Board officials

title: India open to leading WTO reforms, but seeks consensus on agenda: Goyal

title: Fugitive fraudster Jagdish Punetha extradited from Dubai

title: Bihar poll result: Assam Minister‚Äôs ‚Äòcauliflower‚Äô post stirs controversy
content: Netizens were quick to point out that Ashok Singhal was referring to an incident during the 1989 Bhagalpur riots

title: Kerala local body polls 2025:¬†Keen battle on the cards in Perumbavoor as UDF, LDF eye stability
content: While the Congress-led UDF exudes optimism that it would retain power with an improved majority, the CPI(M)-led LDF is hopeful of wresting power in the municipality. The BJP, which has four members in the outgoing council, is eyeing to double its tally this time

title: Kerala local body polls 2025:¬†AAP to contest in over 400 panchayats and four Corporations
content: The anti-corruption movement-turned-political outfit has just one elected ward member in Kerala‚ÄîBeena Kurian from Karinkunnam panchayat in Thodupuzha taluk of Idukki district. The AAP will field candidates in all 14 districts, though not in every local body

title: Massive fire in central Kolkata building; 20 fire engines rushed to spot, no casualties reported
content: Operation is still underway to douse blaze which erupted around 5.30 am on Saturday (November 15); Local councillor said buildings had no proper fire safety measures

title: Kerala local body polls 2025: No need to be a people‚Äôs representative to intervene in people‚Äôs issues, says Mayor Arya Rajendran
content: The outgoing Thiruvananthapuram Mayor is in the thick of electioneering, despite not being a candidate this time. In an interview with The Hindu, she says it is for the party to decide who has to carry out various responsibilities based on political situations

title: Three drown, one missing after car falls into dam in Jharkhand
content: Initial investigation suggests that the driver lost control over the car and the vehicle overturned before falling into the water body

title: Kerala local body polls 2025:  Central Travancore in focus as Kerala Congress seeks to become a tangible political power
content: The party has managed to hold on to almost the same number of seats it contested last time. However, only a strong showing in upcoming polls will allow the party to maintain its leverage at the bargaining table. Performance on the ground is now the currency that will define the influence of the Kerala Congress in the UDF

title: Cancer to comics ‚Äî Bengal researcher makes art out of science
content: This boy from Liluah near Howrah resident, joined the Bose Institute in Kolkata in 2009 as a research scholar on cancer biology, but dropped out of the programme in 2015 without accepting a degree.

content: The renovated facility in Mr. Stalin‚Äôs Kolathur constituency¬†includes air-conditioned library halls, training rooms, and e-learning facilities

title: Delhi car blast: Doctors with bombs
content: On the evening of November 10, an explosion in a car near the Red Fort in Delhi killed 13 people and injured at least 20. Investigations suggest that the suspect, Dr. Umar ul Nabi, who died in the blast, was part of a network that was allegedly plotting terror strikes. Nine people, some of them doctors, have been arrested.¬†Vijaita Singh¬†and¬†Alisha Dutta¬†report on the tragedy in the national capital and the findings of the investigation

title: Arunachal restructures hydropower department to boost generation
content: Chowna Mein, the State‚Äôs Deputy Chief Minister, said only 2% of the hydropower potential of Arunachal Pradesh has been harnessed so far

title: Mahayuti¬†hails NDA‚Äôs win in Bihar as historic while Opposition alleges foul play
content: Nitish Kumar-led NDA scored a historic Bihar victory, drawing praise from allies even as Congress and Shiv Sena (UBT) alleged irregularities and a BJP-driven ‚Äúnational agenda.‚Äù¬†

title: West Bengal BJP enthused with Bihar victory says party‚Äôs victory in State evident in 2026

content: The party has already announced candidates for 62 of the 76 divisions in the Corpn. through two separate lists; first list contained 40 names, followed by another list of 22 candidates on November 13, 2025

title: Keen to get back to active politics: Partha Chatterjee

title: Inquiry report in Sivapriya‚Äôs death rules out hospital-acquired infection
content: Sivapriya, who had a normal delivery on October 22 at SAT hospital, was discharged on October 24 and had been re-admitted with high fever, diarrhoea and in a state of septic shock on October 26th evening. Her death following sepsis on November 5 triggered allegation that the infection was hospital-acquired

title: NWSL semifinals preview: Which recent champs will advance to the final?
content: the four most recent NWSL champions are also the 2025 semifinalists . Gotham defeated the no. 1-seeded Kansas City Current 2-1 in extra time . the Spirit, champions in 2021, lost last year's final to Orlando .

title: Loophole allows McIntyre to return, join Team Vision
content: "you gotta read the fine print" in pro wrestling contracts . the agreement states he could choose any member of the WWE roster across all brands . a suspended Drew McIntyre showed up at the end of "SmackDown" to align himself with Heyman and The Vision .

title: NFL: Chiefs road favorites at Broncos, Seahawks slight 'dogs at Rams

title: The Playbook: Lineup locks, Shadow Reports for Week 11

title: CFP rankings release: See the second top 25 and bracket
content: the college football playoff committee will release its rankings each Tuesday through the end of the regular season . the final set of rankings will be released on Dec. 7 and those rankings will determine the final 12-team bracket . based on the CFP top 25 .

title: NBA execs, scouts on Mavs' spiral and five more early-season trends
content: there weren't many people believing GM Nico Harrison should have remained as Mavs general manager . we decided to ask league executives and scouts if they're believing in some of the most impactful early-season trends across the NBA . the crater that is the Mavericks franchise before moving on to hot starts for the lakers .

title: Area 51, an alien and the most fearsome young duo in the NBA
content: stepon CASTLE screamed, streaking down the floor with 8:28 left in the second quarter of the San Antonio Spurs . "RIM, VIC!" was a turning point in tv's season-opening win in Dallas . a whistle quickly pierced the noisy celebration as Dallas called a timeout to regroup .

title: 'Throwing lasers': Mason Heintschel came out of nowhere. Can he help Pitt win the ACC?
content: pat Narduzzi talks to pat McAfee about how Mason Heintschel has affected the team this season . he says he is an 18-year-old true freshman with five career college starts . "look at the urgency he has when he drops back," he adds .

title: Lions players tell their favorite Dan Campbell stories
content: first-year offensive coordinator was given the tall order of following previous coordinator Ben Johnson in the role . he helped turn the Lions into one of the NFL's top offenses over his three years in charge . the game marked the third straight contest in which Detroit had failed to score .

title: Will the Dawgs do in the Horns? Can the Tide roll on? What you need to know for Week 12
content: most teams will lose another game . there's about a 1-in-3 chance that we end up with even a three-way tie of 7-1 teams atop the ACC . only one has greater than a 54% chance of winning out .
